error.message:
One or more validation errors were detected during model generation:
SystemDepartment_SystemOragnization_Target_SystemDepartment_SystemOragnization_Source: : The types of all properties in the Dependent Role of a referential constraint must be the same as the corresponding property types in the Principal Role. The type of property 'SystemOragnizationID' on entity 'SystemDepartment' does not match the type of property 'Id' on entity 'SystemOragnization' in the referential constraint 'SystemDepartment_SystemOragnization'. User_SystemOragnization_Target_User_SystemOragnization_Source: : The types of all properties in the Dependent Role of a referential constraint must be the same as the corresponding property types in the Principal Role. The type of property 'SystemOragnizationID' on entity 'User' does not match the type of property 'Id' on entity 'SystemOragnization' in the referential constraint 'User_SystemOragnization'. Role_SystemOragnization_Target_Role_SystemOragnization_Source: : The types of all properties in the Dependent Role of a referential constraint must be the same as the corresponding property types in the Principal Role. The type of property 'SystemOragnizationID' on entity 'Role' does not match the type of property 'Id' on entity 'SystemOragnization' in the referential constraint 'Role_SystemOragnization'.
error.detail:
System.Data.Entity.ModelConfiguration.ModelValidationException: One or more validation errors were detected during model generation:
SystemDepartment_SystemOragnization_Target_SystemDepartment_SystemOragnization_Source: : The types of all properties in the Dependent Role of a referential constraint must be the same as the corresponding property types in the Principal Role. The type of property 'SystemOragnizationID' on entity 'SystemDepartment' does not match the type of property 'Id' on entity 'SystemOragnization' in the referential constraint 'SystemDepartment_SystemOragnization'. User_SystemOragnization_Target_User_SystemOragnization_Source: : The types of all properties in the Dependent Role of a referential constraint must be the same as the corresponding property types in the Principal Role. The type of property 'SystemOragnizationID' on entity 'User' does not match the type of property 'Id' on entity 'SystemOragnization' in the referential constraint 'User_SystemOragnization'. Role_SystemOragnization_Target_Role_SystemOragnization_Source: : The types of all properties in the Dependent Role of a referential constraint must be the same as the corresponding property types in the Principal Role. The type of property 'SystemOragnizationID' on entity 'Role' does not match the type of property 'Id' on entity 'SystemOragnization' in the referential constraint 'Role_SystemOragnization'.
